Item.Name: Bone
Item.Comment: Single bone.

Item.Name: Skull
Item.Comment: Single skull with dead eyes and three teeth sticking out.

Item.Name: Carcass
Item.Comment: Part of a ribcage lying on the ground.

Item.Name: Meat
Item.Comment: Club of meat with a bite mark and part of the bone sticking out.

Item.Name: Coins
Item.Comment: Five stacks of coins and a single coin.

Item.Name: Purse
Item.Comment: Leather purse with a string at the top to keep it closed.

Item.Name: Treasure
Item.Comment: Wooden treasure chest, reinforced with iron and a big lock.

Item.Name: Wood
Item.Comment: Wooden log with a single leaf.

Item.Name: Sawdust
Item.Comment: Pile of pulverized sawdust and two bigger chunks in front of it.

Item.Name: Ore
Item.Comment: Piece of ore with a rock-like body and a bunch of smaller chunks sticking out.

Item.Name: Ingots
Item.Comment: Three stacked metal ingots.

Item.Name: Backpack
Item.Comment: Leather backpack with three belt-buckles and two straps.

Item.Name: Bomb
Item.Comment: Bomb with skull face and a fuse.

Item.Name: Arrow
Item.Comment: Arrow with fletchings and a non-wooden tip.

Item.Name: Quiver
Item.Comment: Leather quiver with three arrows inside.

Item.Name: Stone
Item.Comment: Stone block with cracks and a little part broken out.

Item.Name: Bark
Item.Comment: Wooden bark with a leaf.

Item.Name: Turf
Item.Comment: Turf block with two grass patches on it.

Item.Name: Fishbone
Item.Comment: Fishbone with head and fins.

Item.Name: Fish
Item.Comment: Generic fish.

Item.Name: Sword
Item.Comment: Metal sword with separate hilt and additional hilt wrapping.

Item.Name: Axe
Item.Comment: Metal axe with worn out blade and a wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Pickaxe
Item.Comment: Metal pickaxe with wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Hammer
Item.Comment: Metal or wooden hammer with wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Shovel
Item.Comment: Metal shovel with wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Mace
Item.Comment: Spiked metal mace with wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Fishing Rod
Item.Comment: Wooden fishing rod with wrapping, fishing line, floater and fishhook.

Item.Name: Pitchfork
Item.Comment: Metal pitchfork or trident with wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Lance
Item.Comment: Metal lance with wooden handle and wrapping.

Item.Name: Staff
Item.Comment: Wooden staff with wrapping.

Item.Name: Dagger
Item.Comment: Metal dagger with separate hilt and wrapping.

Item.Name: Rapier
Item.Comment: Metal rapier with separate hilt and wrapping.

Item.Name: Worm
Item.Comment: It's a worm, not a snake!

Item.Name: Candle
Item.Comment: Burning candle with running wax.

Item.Name: Sponge
Item.Comment: Sponge in block shape.

Item.Name: Ring
Item.Comment: Metal ring, corrugated on the inside.

Item.Name: Stick
Item.Comment: Wooden stick meant as a resource, not as something to fight with (use the staff for that purpose).

Item.Name: Branch
Item.Comment: Wooden branch.

Item.Name: Leaf
Item.Comment: Generic leaf.

Item.Name: Wooden Shield
Item.Comment: Wooden, round shield with hardened planks in the center and a wooden or metal ring around it.

Item.Name: Iron Shield
Item.Comment: Metal, pointed shield with a lion head embossed.

Item.Name: Dynamite
Item.Comment: Three dynamite parts tied together and with a fuse attached.

Item.Name: Map
Item.Comment: Partitioned map showing an island with a smaller island next to it.

Item.Name: Treasure Map
Item.Comment: Treasure map with a dotted line guiding the reader to a big X.

Item.Name: Letter
Item.Comment: Letter with text and a signature.

Item.Name: Envelope
Item.Comment: Envelope with a wax seal.

Item.Name: Mirror
Item.Comment: Metal hand mirror.

Item.Name: Comb
Item.Comment: Comb, could be made out of metal or bone.

Item.Name: Crate
Item.Comment: Wooden crate with nails holding the planks in place.

Item.Name: Barrel
Item.Comment: Wooden barrel with nails holding the planks in place.

Item.Name: Nail
Item.Comment: Metal nail.

Item.Name: Plank
Item.Comment: Wooden plank or board.

Item.Name: Grass
Item.Comment: Bundle of grass, tied together in the middle.

Item.Name: Herbs
Item.Comment: Bundle of herbs, tied together in the middle, consisting of a flower, grass, leaves and berries.

Item.Name: Flute
Item.Comment: Little flute, could be made out of wood, metal or bone.

Item.Name: Key
Item.Comment: Small key for simple doors or treasure chests.

Item.Name: Boss Key
Item.Comment: Big key with the top formed like a crown. Could be used as a boss key.

Item.Name: Coin
Item.Comment: A metal coin with the letter C embossed. The C has an appendage at the top and bottom to make it similar to the dollar currency sign.

Item.Name: Eyeball
Item.Comment: Eyeball with part of the nerve attached.

Item.Name: Sleeping Bag
Item.Comment: Sleeping bag or roll made out of wool or grass.

Item.Name: Amulet
Item.Comment: Metal amulet with a triangle embossed and attached to a leather strap.

Item.Name: Bow
Item.Comment: Wooden bow with wrapping.

Item.Name: Torch
Item.Comment: Wooden torch with wrapping at the top and at the bottom.

Item.Name: Mop
Item.Comment: Wooden mop to wish the floor, with wrapping.

Item.Name: Apple
Item.Comment: Big apple with leaf.

Item.Name: Bread
Item.Comment: Load of bread shaped like toast.

Item.Comment: Generic flower.

Item.Comment: Single leather boot with heel.

Item.Description: An empty bottle with a letter.

Item.Comment: Book with leather casing and buckle.

Item.Name: Rock
Item.Comment: Small rock and an even smaller rock behind it.

Item.Comment: Wooden boomerang with two wrappings.

Item.Comment: Pile of manure and a fly.

Item.Name: Lantern
Item.Comment: Burning lantern in glass case with metal bottom and top as well as a metal hook to carry it around.

Item.Name: Honey
Item.Comment: A pile of honey with a honey comb sticking out of it and a (probably) dead bee in the front.

Item.Name: Beehive
Item.Comment: A beehive with two bees flying around.

Item.Name: Bee
Item.Comment: A fat bee.

Item.Name: Fairy
Item.Description: A little fairy, fluttering in circles.
Item.Comment: A fairy creature with wings and two arms, one of them holding a staff. Three sparkles to the right.

Item.Name: Crystal
Item.Description: A shiny and valuable crystal shard.
Item.Comment: A crystal shard or rupee.

Item.Name: Heart Piece
Item.Description: A piece of a full heart.
Item.Comment: A heart piece like in your favorite action adventure game series.

Item.Name: Heart
Item.Comment: A full heart like in your favorite action adventure game series.

Item.Name: Tent
Item.Comment: A tent with sticks sticking out at the top and wooden plugs on the ground.

Item.Name: Jar
Item.Comment: An empty glass jar with a cap.

Item.Name: Doll
Item.Description: A little doll made out of cloth.
Item.Comment: A doll or voodoo puppet with cloth wrappings.

Item.Name: Cheese
Item.Comment: A piece of cheese with holes in it.

Item.Name: Bust
Item.Description: A bust, showing the head of an unknown person.
Item.Comment: A stone bust showing a male head with curly hair.

Item.Name: Diamond
Item.Comment: A diamond.

Item.Name: Beer
Item.Comment: A mug of foamy beer.

Item.Name: Ice Cube
Item.Comment: A melting ice cube on a pool of water.

Item.Name: Potato
Item.Comment: A potato with spots on it.

Item.Name: Saddle

Item.Name: Ghost
